TianShanMountains.name: Tian Shan
TianShanMountains.description: Large system of mountain ranges in Central Asia, known as the 'Mountains of God/Heaven'.

tectonicActivity.earlyPaleozoic: Northern and eastern sections underwent folding
tectonicActivity.latePaleozoic: Western and southern portions underwent folding

demography.migrationPatterns: Significant migration to Ili River Valley and other areas

historicalSignificance.earlyReferences: Related to the Xiongnu word Qilian, meaning 'sky' or 'heaven'.

Tengrism.description: Sacred in Tengrism, with peaks like Khan Tengri being significant.
